titleStmt.title: The history of the Inquisition, as it is exercised at Goa written in French, by the ingenious Monsieur Dellon, who laboured five years under those severities ; with an account of his deliverance ; translated into English.
Relation de l'Inquisition de Goa. English
titleStmt.author: Dellon, Gabriel, b. 1649.
Wharton, Henry, 1664-1695.

notesStmt.note: Translation by Henry Wharton of: Relation de l'Inquisition de Goa. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
